mapper.sql: id, qry_id qryId, tb_name tbName, alias alias, col col, remark remark, creater_id createrId, creater_name createrName, updater_id updaterId, updater_name updaterName, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_eva_queryselect ( id, qry_id, tb_name, alias, col, remark, creater_id, creater_name, updater_id, updater_name, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{qryId}, #{tbName}, #{alias}, #{col}, #{remark}, #{createrId}, #{createrName}, #{updaterId}, #{updaterName}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_eva_queryselect
qry_id=#{qryId},
tb_name=#{tbName},
alias=#{alias},
col=#{col},
remark=#{remark},
creater_id=#{createrId},
creater_name=#{createrName},
updater_id=#{updaterId},
updater_name=#{updaterName},
create_date=#{createDate},
update_date=#{updateDate},
WHERE id =#{id}

UPDATE t_eva_queryselect
qry_id=#{map.qryId},
tb_name=#{map.tbName},
alias=#{map.alias},
col=#{map.col},
remark=#{map.remark},
creater_id=#{map.createrId},
creater_name=#{map.createrName},
updater_id=#{map.updaterId},
updater_name=#{map.updaterName},
create_date=#{map.createDate},
update_date=#{map.updateDate},
WHERE id = #{ map.id }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_eva_queryselect ( id, qry_id, tb_name, alias, col, remark, creater_id, creater_name, updater_id, updater_name, create_date, update_date, ) VALUES ( #{map.id}, #{map.qryId}, #{map.tbName}, #{map.alias}, #{map.col}, #{map.remark}, #{map.createrId}, #{map.createrName}, #{map.updaterId}, #{map.updaterName}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.updateDate}, )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_eva_queryselect
AND id like '%#{id}%'
AND qry_id Like '%$ {condition.qryId}%'
AND tb_name Like '%$ {condition.tbName}%'
AND alias Like '%$ {condition.alias}%'
AND col Like '%$ {condition.col}%'
AND remark Like '%$ {condition.remark}%'
AND creater_id Like '%$ {condition.createrId}%'
AND creater_name Like '%$ {condition.createrName}%'
AND updater_id Like '%$ {condition.updaterId}%'
AND updater_name Like '%$ {condition.updaterName}%'
AND create_date Like '%$ {condition.createDate}%'
AND update_date Like '%$ {condition.updateDate}%'
